title: Rudy Snap Cocktail
directions: Combine mezcal, lime juice, simple syrup, and amaro liqueur in a cocktail shaker; fill with ice, cover, and shake until chilled. Fill a lowball glass with ice. Strain cocktail into lowball glass, top with ginger beer, and float schnapps over the top. Garnish with mint and lime.
ingredients: 1/4 fluid ounce amaro liqueur (such as Hum)
1/2 fluid ounce wormwood-flavored schnapps (such as Jeppson's Malort)
